title: Eisenhower National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park           Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more:  IKE NEWS For the latest Eisenhower NHS news, including updates and details about current park happenings, check out our NEWS page. HISTORY Visit our HISTORY AND CULTURE pages for Eisenhower articles, quotes, chronologies, top 5 lists, and an inside look at some of the 40,000 artifacts in the site’s museum collection.  EDUCATION The site offers a variety of activities for students in its education programming for grades 4 – 12 as well as professional development opportunities for teachers. FOR KIDS Check out our Junior Secret Service Agent program and the Strictly For Kids Eisenhower Home Virtual Tour. NATURE Eisenhower NHS comprises nearly 700 acres of cropland, pasture, riparian areas, and oak- hickory forest. Check out our nature pages to learn what varieties of plant and animal species inhabit the site’s diverse habitat.
